content.raw:
It looks like you're running a new world with an old plugin.

Manually copying files is tricky. It's safer to use catkin to install and then source the install.

This is how I install srcsim from source:

~~~
mkdir code
cd ~/code
hg clone http://bitbucket.org/osrf/srcsim
mkdir -p srcsim_ws/src
cd srcsim_ws/src/
ln -s ~/code/srcsim
cd ..
catkin_make install
. install/setup.bash
~~~

It looks like you're running a new world with an old plugin.

Manually copying files is tricky. It's safer to use catkin to install and then source the install.

This is how I install srcsim from source:

mkdir code
cd ~/code
hg clone http://bitbucket.org/osrf/srcsim
